interface.name: zww_background_v1
interface.description:
The object is a singleton global.
This interface can only be bound once at the same time. Any binding of this interface while already bound results in a protocol error (bound).

enum.name: error
enum.description: These errors can be emitted in response to ww_background requests.

entry.name: default
entry.summary: the compositor will use its own default

request.name: set_background

description.summary: sets the wl_surface as the wl_output background

request.description:
This gives the wl_surface the role of a background. If the wl_surface already has another role, it raises a protocol error (role).
The surface will be centered on the output, then fitted using to the specified method.
